channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Billion-Dollar Data Centers Are Taking Over the World
item.description: The battle for AI dominance has left a large footprint—and it’s only getting bigger and more expensive.

item.title: My year in smartphones – 2025 was the year of the AI phone
item.description: New-ish looks, better cameras, and a whole lot of AI marked my 2025 smartphone journey.

item.title: Forget Audible and Amazon – I'm switching to these 5 alternatives for audiobooks and e-books in 2026
item.description: Amazon and Audible aren't the only places to get the best e-books and audiobooks –in fact, these 5 alternatives will make you feel much warmer inside.

item.title: Spotify piraté, bug assumé par Google et Xiaomi 17 Ultra – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Cette semaine a été marquée par le piratage de Spotify, une mise à jour controversée des Pixel et plusieurs annonces Xiaomi en Chine parmi lesquels le Xiaomi 17 Ultra.

item.title: Draft Chinese AI Rules Outline ‘Core Socialist Values’ for AI Human Personality Simulators
item.description: China may soon have rules governing AI interactions.

item.title: The worst camera for 2025 was this Lumix compact — it was a backwards step from a dated predecessor
item.description: The Lumix ZS99 / TZ99 felt like a backwards step from the 2019 model it replaced, but beyond that it's Panasonic's lack of action in the trending compact camera space that's baffling

item.title: Envie d’équiper une pièce en TV ? Ce LG de 43″ LED compatible 4K et HDR est à son meilleur prix
item.description: Si l’idée est d’ajouter un téléviseur dans une chambre ou une pièce secondaire, ce LG 43UT81006LA fait le job sans faire sauter la banque. Sa dalle LED Ultra HD est propre, polyvalente, et largement suffisante pour le quotidien. Et comme souvent, c’est le prix qui finit de convaincre : de 409 euros à seulement 246,99 euros chez PC Componentes.

item.title: ‘This Will Be a Stressful Job’: OpenAI Is Hiring for a Position That Sounds Horrifying
item.description: Being OpenAI's "head of preparedness" sounds like a hellish way to make a living.

item.title: Les meilleures manettes pour smartphone Android et iPhone en 2025
item.description: Vous êtes adepte de gaming mobile ? Que ce soit pour jouer à Fortnite ou encore utiliser un émulateur, une manette est indispensable pour jouer dans de bonnes conditions sur votre smartphone Android. Voici notre sélection des meilleures manettes pour téléphone.

item.title: The Dollar Is Facing an End to Its Dominance
item.description: Questions around the reliability of the US greenback are dulling the luster of what was the world’s currency of trade. New, global alternatives are emerging.

item.title: Stop putting your wet phone in rice – experts explain why it can do more harm than good
item.description: We’ve all heard that putting a wet phone in rice can save it – but experts say it may do more harm than good.

item.title: "Threat actors have a goal in mind and they'll use whatever path they see to get that goal" - AWS CISO tells us how your company can stay safe, by being more like Amazon
item.description: Being smart about AI in cybersecurity can make all the difference, AWS CISO tells us.

item.title: Landman season 2 will 'never' feature the ultimate sidekick for Cami — and I'm absolutely distraught
item.description: Cami's having a rough ride in Landman season 2, but I think she's missing something. According to Demi Moore, that something will sadly 'never' happen.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros. par Netflix : négociations, Paramount et HBO Max tout comprendre à la situation
item.description: C'est l'un des temps forts de cette fin d'année. Le rachat de Warner Bros. Discovery par Netflix s'est transformé en véritable feuilleton avec l'arrivée de Paramount dans les négociations. Nous faisons le point sur la situation.

item.title: Open earbuds guide: What they are, who should buy them, and why theyre popping up everywhere
item.description: More and more brands are including open earbuds in their lineup, so our headphone expert explained what they are, who they're for, and which open earbuds are our favorites.
